donor_name: SYRIA MINISTRY OF TECHNOLOGY AND COMMUNICATION
outputs.output_descr: The ultimate objective of this project "Modernization of the Syrian Post Authority Services" is to support the Syrian Government in its efforts to implement the development programme of the post services covering policies improvement, organizational restructuring, process improvement and modernization Towards this objective, the project consists of four main components:i) finalizing the Procedures of implementing the universal post services according to the market needs and the cost; ii) developing and approving the postal sector policy; iii) preparing the Post legal reform actual implementation of  the legal framework, iv) developing the legal entity of the public operator
